The tournament will occur online, with matches starting on January 22 and the finals on January 28. Fans’ votes will determine the winner. Literature ReviewThe Dragon Ball Secret Battle Hour will allow fans to vote online to determine which Dragon Ball Super character will be “the strongest”.

item.title: Dragon Ball Z s Cell Actually NEVER Reached His Ultimate Form (By Missing 1 Upgrade)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCell could have achieved his ‘perfect’ form if he absorbed a Mouma from Dragon Ball GT. Mouma are giant, man-eating worms with a tough shell on their heads that even Goku and his allies couldn’t break. Absorbing a Mouma would have reinforced Cell’s most vulnerable spot, making him unbeatable. Literature ReviewCell is already a terrifyingly indestructible villain within the Dragon Ball universe, and Dragon Ball GT reveals a way to make him even stronger.

item.title: DS9 Foreshadowed Star Trek Prodigy s Paramount Plus Controversy
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYStar Trek: Prodigy’s cancellation and removal from Paramount+ undermined the streaming service’s claim to have every Trek show. The streaming rights issue surrounding the missing episode “Duet” from Star Trek: Deep Space Nine further highlighted the mishandling of Star Trek titles on Paramount+. The inconsistent availability of Star Trek content on Paramount+ demonstrates the unreliability of digital streaming compared to physical media. Literature ReviewDeep Space Nine had its own Paramount+ controversy before Star Trek: Prodigy was canceled, emphasizing the precarious nature of the streaming age.

item.title: Echo Cast, Story Details, & Everything We Know
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarvel Studios’ Echo, a spinoff of Hawkeye, will release on Disney+ as part of MCU Phase 5, introducing the character’s origin story and exploring Native American culture. Echo’s solo series is set to be released in January 2024, and is the first MCU series to release in its entirety. Echo will feature a diverse cast, including indigenous actors, and will see the return of characters like Kingpin and Daredevil, setting up important partnerships and conflicts for future street-level stories in the MCU.

item.title: Echo interview Alaqua Cox On Wilson Fisk & The Importance Of Representation In The MCU
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEcho, played by Alaqua Cox, is a Native American anti-hero who returns to her hometown and reconnects with her heritage. Representation and authenticity are important to the show, with partnerships with the Choctaw Nation to ensure accurate portrayal. Maya’s relationship with Wilson Fisk, who taught her violence, is explored, showing her transition from selfishness to selflessness. Literature ReviewEcho star Alaqua Cox discusses Maya Lopez’s relationship with Kingpin, the importance of representation, and collaborating with the Choctaw Nation.

item.title: Echo Interview Chaske Spencer & Devery Jacobs On Maya s Found Family In New MCU Show
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEcho, a spin-off of Hawkeye, follows Maya Lopez as she returns to her hometown and reconnects with her Native American heritage. The series explores Maya’s complex relationship with her uncle Henry and her childhood friend Bonnie, revealing her vulnerable side. Echo delves into the theme of family, as Maya learns to embrace her past and redefine what it means to her, showcasing her transformation from a selfish to a selfless individual.

item.title: Echo Interview Composer Dave Porter On Joining The MCU After Better Call Saul & Breaking Bad
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarvel’s Echo is a fresh and exciting exploration of a different corner of the Marvel Cinematic Universe, featuring the return of Daredevil and Kingpin. Echo reviews hail the show for its gritty storytelling, reminiscent of the Marvel Netflix shows, and its authentic Choctaw Nation music. The collaboration between Dave Porter and the Choctaw Nation resulted in a score that captures the dichotomy between Maya’s New York and Choctaw worlds, incorporating historical Choctaw flavors of music.

item.title: Echo Interview Director Sydney Freeland On Maya s Dysfunctional Relationship With Wilson Fisk
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGrounding Maya’s background in the Choctaw Nation created a more intimate and authentic story, with the inclusion of the Choctaw Nation of Oklahoma providing expertise and feedback. The visual language and use of ASL in the show were intentional and stemmed from the representation of sign language. -ups and emphasis on facial expressions allow for better understanding and conveying of emotional intent. The series explores Maya’s perception of family, challenging her preconceived notions and potentially reshaping her worldview.

item.title: Echo Interview Richie Palmer On Wilson Fisk s Reach Beyond New York & Marvel Spotlight Stories
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEcho follows Maya Lopez as she returns to her hometown in Oklahoma to escape Wilson Fisk’s organization. Maya reconnects with her Native American roots and embraces her community and family. The series features returning MCU actors Vincent D’Onofrio as Wilson Fisk and Charlie Cox as Matt Murdock. Literature ReviewEcho executive producer discusses Wilson Fisk’s reach, creating the world of Echo, and which character he wants to see as part of Marvel Spotlight.

item.title: Echo Interview Vincent DOnofrio On Wilson Fisk s Place In The MCU & Relationship With Maya Lopez
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYVincent D’Onofrio’s portrayal of Wilson Fisk in Echo showcases a more paternal and manipulative side of the character, exploring his relationship with Maya and the intense dynamics between them. Fisk’s power extends beyond New York, and his reach will be further explored not only in Echo but in other upcoming projects as well. D’Onofrio recognizes the mature tone of Echo, believing that it brings out the best in his character and creates the same uneasy feeling that Fisk evoked in Daredevil.

item.title: Echo Interview Writer Amy Rardin On Continuing Wilson Fisk s Story & Digging Into Maya s Origin
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEcho, played by Alaqua Cox, returns to her hometown in Oklahoma to confront her past, including her relationship with Wilson Fisk and her Native American roots. The Disney+ series explores Maya’s complex and gritty journey as a female anti-hero, delving into her emotional story and character development. The show features a collaboration with the Choctaw Nation, bringing authenticity to Maya’s cultural background and showcasing the rich small-town characters and family dynamics.

item.title: Echo Maya Lopezs Powers & Comic History Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEcho has a complex backstory in Marvel Comics, starting as a vigilante seeking revenge for her father’s death and eventually becoming a full-fledged superhero who defeats Kingpin and joins the Avengers. Echo’s backstory and powers have been slightly altered in the MCU. The MCU’s Maya Lopez blames Hawkeye for her father’s death instead of Daredevil, and she develops supernatural instincts that replace her comic book counterpart’s mimicry skills. Marvel’s Echo is a key release for the MCU, as it brings Netflix’s Marvel shows to MCU canon and makes history with Maya Lopez’s indigenous heritage and deaf representation.

item.title: Echo Review MCU s First 2024 Show Feels Like A Grand Return To Marvel TV s Netflix Era
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEcho is a strong outing for Marvel Studios and one of its most unique and compelling Marvel shows. The show focuses on street-level fighting between Maya and Kingpin, giving it a more character-driven feel. Echo features Marvel’s first deaf and Indigenous superhero, with representation and unique storytelling as key strengths. Literature ReviewMarvel’s Echo starts off slow, playing catchup for new viewers, but quickly ramps up into one of Disney+’s most thrilling MCU offerings.

item.title: Echo Season 1 Story Recap 10 Things To Know From Previous MCU Movies & Shows
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNetflix’s Daredevil series is canon in the MCU, connecting the histories of Daredevil and Kingpin to Marvel’s upcoming Echo show. Daredevil became the protector of Hell’s Kitchen and worked to dismantle Kingpin’s criminal empire. Kingpin survived the Snap and took over the Tracksuit Mafia after manipulating Ronin into killing Maya Lopez’Lopez’sr. Having learned the truth in 2021’s Hawkeye, Maya now wants revenge on Fisk who once been seen as her “uncle”.

item.title: Echo Season 2 Cast, Story & Everything We Know
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarvel Studios has not confirmed a second season of Echo, and it may be a miniseries spinoff with no plans for continuation. The mixed reviews of Echo may further discourage the creation of a season 2. If there is a season 2, it could explore the relationship between Maya Lopez and Matt Murdock, as well as delve into Wilson Fisk’s backstory and his connection to Maya. Literature ReviewFollowing the release of Marvel Studios’ Echo series on January 9, 2024, news on a potential season 2 in the MCU’s future has been scarce.

item.title: Echo Show Cast & Marvel Character Guide
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEcho introduces new faces to the MCU, with the majority of the cast being MCU newcomers. The series showcases an authentic indigenous representation in its cast and explores Echo’s roots in more detail. The show establishes a bond between Daredevil and Echo, hinting at a romantic connection as seen in Marvel Comics. Literature ReviewHawkeye’s MCU spinoff, Echo, relased as part of Phase 5, seeing the return of Maya Lopez as well as several new Marvel Studios characters.

item.title: Enterprises Mystery Chef Should Have Been 1 Of 3 Star Trek Characters
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYStar Trek: Enterprise missed an opportunity by not revealing the identity of the NX-01’s Chef, who was renowned as the finest cook in Starfleet and constantly mentioned by Captain Archer and his crew. William Shatner rejected the idea of guest-starring as Captain James T. Kirk, who would impersonate the NX-01’s Chef and be revealed as an ancestor of James T. Kirk. Instead, Shatner wanted to play Kirk’s evil mirror universe doppelgänger.

item.title: Every Anime Coming to HIDIVE in January 2024
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHIDIVE’s January 2024 lineup offers a variety of new and older anime shows for fans to enjoy, including subbed episodes simulcast with Japanese airings and long-awaited English dubs. HIDIVE’s back catalog includes ongoing shows from 2023 and recently ended series, such as The Dangers in My Heart and The Eminence in Shadow, providing options for fans to binge-watch completed series. The most exciting series in HIDIVE’s winter lineup are the new shows they are featuring, including Gushing Over Magical Girls, Chained Soldier, and My Instant Death Ability is Overpowered, which offer a good variety for fans to watch.

item.title: Every Brooklyn Nine-Nine Halloween Heist Episode, Ranked
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Halloween Heists in Brooklyn Nine-Nine have become a beloved tradition, with unexpected twists and surprising winners every year. Each Halloween Heist episode keeps things fresh and unique by involving more characters and upping the ante. The Halloween Heists have had memorable moments, from Amy becoming a mastermind to Terry orchestrating a plot using Cheddar and department members. Literature ReviewThe Halloween Heist episodes of Brooklyn Nine-Nine are a high point of each season, but which heist was the best?

item.title: Every Corey Fogelmanis Movie & TV Show Ranked (Including Girl Meets World)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCorey Fogelmanis is a dynamic and versatile actor who has made significant strides in Hollywood. He has showcased his talent in various genres, from thrilling dramas to heartwarming family sitcoms. Fogelmanis has gained recognition for his ability to bring depth to his characters and has become a beloved young figure in the entertainment industry. Literature ReviewCorey Fogelmanis is one of the most promising up-and-coming actors working today, and he already has several great movies and TV shows under his belt.

item.title: Every Game Of Thrones Actor In Benioff & Weiss 3 Body Problem
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGame of Thrones creators Benioff and Weiss are bringing their talents to Netflix’s 3 Body Problem, which features several GoT actors in its cast. The series, based on Liu Cixin’s trilogy, explores the impact of decisions in 1960s China on modern-day scientists facing an otherworldly threat. The show’s trailer and teasers provide little information, leaving fans cautiously optimistic about how Benioff and Weiss will adapt the sci-fi/fantasy/drama genre. Literature ReviewGame of Thrones creators David Benioff and D.

item.title: Every Game Of Thrones Character Killed Too Soon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGame of Thrones shocked audiences by killing off main characters early, changing the direction of the story and intensifying conflicts. Some deaths, like Catelyn Stark’s and Syrio Forel’s, happened too soon, depriving the show of potential storylines and character development. The premature deaths of characters like Renly Baratheon and Oberyn Martell prevented them from fulfilling their potential and offering fresh perspectives on the plot. Literature ReviewGame of Thrones made its name by killing characters no matter how important, but some were killed too soon, as they could have played bigger roles.

item.title: Every Green Ranger After Tommy Proved What Made Mighty Morphins Evil Ranger So Special
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTommy Oliver’s debut as the evil Green Ranger in Mighty Morphin Power Rangers made him one of the franchise’s best characters. The Green Ranger color itself is not what made Tommy iconic, but rather his introduction as an evil Ranger and his transformation into a hero. Other Green Rangers in the franchise were usually founding members of their teams. Only one Green Ranger after Tommy, Ninja Storm’s Cam Watanabe, was also a sixth Ranger.

item.title: Every Harry Potter Fan Will Be At Least 10 Years Older Before HBO s TV Show Actually Becomes Worthwhile
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHBO’s Harry Potter TV remake will take several years to premiere, but it offers a chance to repair the movies’ biggest omissions and alterations. The series will follow a “book faithful” adaptation and each season will correspond to a Harry Potter book, providing more room to tell Harry’s story. Audiences will have to wait until at least the 2030s to see the most anticipated moments from the books, so HBO needs to make the initial seasons interesting to keep viewers engaged.

item.title: Every HBO TV Show Releasing In 2024
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHBO’s 2023 lineup saw the conclusion of popular shows like Succession and His Dark Materials, but new and returning series are expected in 2024. The WGA and SAG-AFTRA strikes may lead to delays for shows like Euphoria and The Last of Us, but there are still plenty of great TV shows coming up on HBO. True Detective season 4, The Regime, The Sympathizer, Curb Your Enthusiasm season 12, House of the Dragon season 2, The White Lotus season 3, and The Righteous Gemstones season 4 are all expected to be released in 2024, with some potential for delays.

item.title: Every House M.D. Season, Ranked Worst To Best
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHouse Season 7 disappointingly concludes the relationship between House and Cuddy, which was supposed to save him from himself. House Season 8 focuses more on the team and their struggles, but still ends on a positive note for House and Wilson. House Season 5 delves into darker storylines, putting a strain on House and Wilson’s relationship while also showcasing the show’s strengths. Literature ReviewHouse is one of the most brilliant shows on TV, but just like any other, it experienced highs and lows with some seasons better than others.

item.title: Every Major Walking Dead Character Who Died Before The End
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY“The Walking Dead” has the highest death count of any TV show, with major characters falling victim to zombies, humans, and disease. The original main cast of “The Walking Dead” has been almost entirely wiped out throughout the show’s 11 seasons. Each character’s death in “The Walking Dead” is significant and often tragic, adding to the show’s massive graveyard of characters. Literature ReviewThe Walking Dead has killed off more characters than just about any other show - here’s every TWD character who died, including in the series finale.

item.title: Every Marvel & DC Show That Ended In 2023
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDC properties comprised the most frequently cut shows of 2023 as the DCU plans for 2024 and beyond. Some DC and Marvel shows in 2023 reached a natural and satisfying conclusion, pleasing fans. The Flash, with nearly a decade under its belt, ended in February as the DCU seeks to reinvigorate the franchise. Literature ReviewThere were several DC and Marvel TV shows that came to an end in 2023, be it narratively or due to cancellations from networks and studios.

item.title: Every Mythological Species & Monster In Percy Jackson Season 1 Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPercy Jackson and the Olympians faithfully adapts the Greek mythology-based creatures and monsters from the original book series, bringing them to life in a fantastic world-building style. This includes the presence of recognizable creatures like Pegasus, Automatons, Furies, Minotaur, Satyrs, Centaurs, and Wood Nymphs, among others. As the series progresses, more creatures and monsters from Greek mythology will be introduced, staying true to the beloved book series by Rick Riordan.

item.title: Every Person Walter White Killed On Breaking Bad
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWalter White’s descent into villainy on Breaking Bad is highlighted by his high body count, with almost 300 people killed directly or indirectly. Despite not necessarily being a psychotic murderer, Walt’s indifference towards the deaths he caused, and his eventual ruthlessness, are chilling. The number of people Walt kills rises significantly at key points throughout the series, showcasing his transformation into a true villain. Literature ReviewThrough five seasons of Breaking Bad, Walter White was responsible for the deaths of hundreds, and that’s not even counting anyone killed by his meth.

item.title: Every Real Pirate In Black Sails & What Happened To Them
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBlack Sails is a detailed example of historical fiction, featuring real historical pirates in its main cast. The fates of historical pirates such as Anne Bonny, “Calico Jack” Rackham, and Charles Vane are depicted with similarities to history. Black Sails hints at the further adventures of real historical pirate Mary Read with Bonny and Rackham. Literature ReviewBlack Sails cast of complex characters includes both fictional pirates from Treasure Island and historical figures from the Golden Age of Piracy.

item.title: Every That 70s Show Easter Egg & Reference In That 90s Show Season 1
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThat ’90s Show features numerous Easter eggs and references to That ’70s Show, providing a nostalgic continuation of the original characters’ stories. Eric and Donna’s daughter, Leia, experiences many of the same places, activities, and people her parents did 15 years earlier in Point Place. The opening of That ’90s Show mirrors the pilot of That ’70s Show, and iconic catchphrases, like Red’s insults, and Eric’s Star Wars obsession make a return.

item.title: Every Version Of Clara Oswald In Doctor Who, Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYClara Oswald’s numerous splinters played a crucial role in Doctor Who and were scattered across space and time to save the Doctor. The deaths of Oswin Oswald and Clara Oswin Oswald were somehow tied to the main iteration of Clara Oswald, adding depth to her character. Clara’s identities were used by the Doctor’s enemies and other non-humans to show the consequences of their friendship and how it could affect time.

item.title: Every What If Season 2 Episode Ranked Worst To Best
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWhat If…? Season 2 successfully elevates side characters to center stage, proving they can lead their own MCU projects. The best episodes of the season are self-contained and character-focused, exploring how familiar characters learn and grow in unfamiliar situations. Some episodes suffer from feeling bloated and relying too heavily on fan-service, throwing new Avengers on the screen without meaningful development. Literature ReviewAll 9 episodes of the second season of What If…?

item.title: Everything Is Canon Doctor Who Has Solved All Its Continuity Problems With One Line
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDoctor Who solves its contradictory continuity by using the Toymaker’s jigsaw puzzle, making everything canon. The show’s deliberate confusion in continuity is due to its unexpected longevity and various showrunners. Fans can now make their own connections and interpretations, freeing Doctor Who to tell new stories without being restrained by canon. Literature Review“The Giggle” finally gave Doctor Who a solution to inconsistent continuity, but will the Toymaker’s jigsaw be enough to stop arguments about canon?

item.title: Everything We Know About Legacies Season 5 s Canceled Story Plans
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYLegacies season 5 would have had a time jump, taking the characters beyond the Salvatore School and exploring their lives outside of it. The season 4 finale set up storylines for Legacies season 5, including Jed and Ben grappling without their powers and Kaleb and Cleo’s relationship. Legacies season 5 would have introduced Stephanie Salvatore, the daughter of Elena and Damon, and explored the children of other beloved characters in the Vampire Diaries universe.

item.title: Everything We Know About Tarre Vizsla, The First Mandalorian Jedi
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTarre Vizsla was a revered figure who managed to become both a Mandalorian and a Jedi, earning the respect of both religions. Tarre lived during a pivotal time in the Star Wars galaxy, witnessing the defeat of the Sith Empire and the beginning of a new era of peace. While Tarre did not follow the same Mandalorian Creed as Din Djarin, he still earned the respect of almost every Mandalorian and played a significant role in uniting the Clans of Mandalore.

item.title: Everything Worst Roommate Ever Leaves Out About Jamison Bachman
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWorst Roommate Ever is a Netflix true crime series that explores disturbing stories of roommates gone wrong, including a serial squatter and a serial killing grandma. The series leaves out important details about Jamison Bachman, such as his traumatic experience witnessing the murder of his close friend and his legal background. Viewers found the series impactful because it highlighted the potential dangers of living with strangers and the need for thorough background checks when finding a roommate.

item.title: Exciting New HIDIVE Anime Combines Isekai With Death Games & a Possible Twist
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe protagonist, Takatou, may have already possessed powers before being transported to the new fantasy world, which breaks the conventional isekai format. Takatou’s lack of glowing when transported could be explained by him being asleep, suggesting that he received his powers along with everyone else. The series also tackles the unconventional idea of heroes becoming villains in their second isekai experience, a rarity in isekai anime. Literature ReviewThe first episode of HIDIVE’s My Instant Death Ability Is So Overpowered is hinting that its death games isekai could be breaking conventions.

item.title: Ezra Bridger Actor Eman Esfandi Has The Perfect Ahsoka Season 2 Theory
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSeason 2 of Ahsoka could focus on Ezra Bridger’s mission to bring Sabine Wren and Ahsoka Tano back home, suggests star Eman Esfandi. The Ezra actor pitches an idea where his character’s goal is to ensure everyone is safe and feels at home, so bringing back Wren and Tano is crucial. The theory also allows for the return of Grand Admiral Thrawn and exploration of Wren’s and Tano’s experiences on Peridea.

item.title: Ezra Bridger Actor Reveals His Favorite Ahsoka Fight Scenes & Stunts
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEman Esfandi’s stunts in Ahsoka were impressive and showcased his talent. The fight scenes and lightsaber moments were particularly memorable for the actor given that they were the first scenes Esfandi shot during production. Esfandi’s performance made the live-action version of Ezra Bridger feel true to Star Wars Rebels which is hopefully something that will continue in future Star Wars appearances. Literature ReviewThe actor responsible for bringing Ezra Bridger to live-action Star Wars in Ahsoka has revealed his favorite stunt moments from the show.

item.title: Family Guy s 20 Darkest Episodes
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY“Fresh Heir” pushes boundaries with incestuous humor, as Peter kills an innocent child and proposes to Chris with Lois’s ring. “The 2000-Year-Old Virgin” offends the Christian community by depicting Jesus as a sleazeball who manipulates women. “Brian Griffin’s House of Payne” takes dark humor to new heights as the Griffin family treats Stewie like a ragdoll, resulting in Lois unknowingly running over her own baby. Literature ReviewFamily Guy has a reputation for controversy, but Seth MacFarlane’s animated show really outdid itself with these offensive and/or disturbing episodes.

item.title: Fan-Favorite Green Lantern Actor Candidate Reignites DC Universe Casting Hopes
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSterling K. Brown is a fan of the Justice League cartoon and found representation in seeing a Black Green Lantern, John Stewart. He expressed excitement at the possibility of playing John in the DC Universe and how it would resonate with his kids. Brown feels a personal connection to the character and feels it would be a genuinely thrilling opportunity if it were to happen. Literature ReviewA long-time fan favorite actor choice for John Stewart sparks new interest in him being cast in James Gunn’s DC Universe as an iconic Green Lantern.

item.title: Fargo Season 5 Episode 8 s Ending Has A Deeper Meaning For Dot, Says Juno Temple
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYJuno Temple explains the deeper meaning behind Fargo season 5, episode 8’s ending. The episode’s ending, with Graves being killed and buried on Roy’s property, indicates the importance of Dot fighting for her survival. Dot realizes that without a strong fight, she may not make it out alive. Literature ReviewFargo star Juno Temple says season 5, episode 8’s ending has a deeper meaning for Dot, setting the stage for the final episodes of her story.

item.title: Fargo Season 5 Episode 9 Recap Lorraine s Fight Against Roy s Militia & 9 Other Reveals
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDot escapes from the barn and takes control of the situation. Olmstead becomes Lorraine’s head of security and investigates the missing Danish Graves. Lorraine sends a military convoy to Roy’s ranch as she seeks justice for Dot. Literature ReviewWith action-packed storylines bringing all the characters together, the penultimate episode of Fargo season 5 is building up to an explosive finale. This article contains spoilers for Fargo season 5 (up to episode 9).

item.title: Fargo Season 5 s Wild Finale Teased By Witt Actor
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA wild finale awaits viewers of Fargo season 5, according to actor Lamorne Morris. Many deserving actors on the show deserve awards, including Juno Temple, Sam Spruell, Jon Hamm, and Jennifer Jason Leigh. The performances are “dope” and the story gets crazy and wild. Get ready for some great entertainment. Literature ReviewWitt Farr actor Lamorne Morris teases a wild finale for Fargo season 5, while telling audiences to watch out for great performances from his co-stars.

item.title: Fargo Season 5 Soundtrack Guide - Every Song & When It Plays
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Fargo season 5 soundtrack has a ton of great needle-drops in between pieces from its foreboding original score. The use of licensed music in FX’s Fargo ties back to the classic Coen brothers movie it was based on, which featured songs by Merle Haggard and Boy George. Fargo season 5 includes songs by such renowned artists as Yes, Rush, and Marilyn Manson. Literature ReviewThe Fargo season 5 soundtrack is full of great needle-drops.

item.title: Faster, Purple Worm! Kill! Kill! Interview David Dastmalchian On The Suicide Squad Cast Game Nights
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFaster, Purple Worm! Kill! Kill! is a chaotic but entertaining D&D show that features first-level characters facing off against powerful monsters. The show reunites co-stars David Dastmalchian and Steve Agee and also stars Matthew Lillard and Noura Ibrahim. Playing D&D allows actors to use their skills in different ways and offers a unique experience of tension and discovery through dice rolling. Literature ReviewDavid Dastmalchian discusses The Suicide Squad cast game nights, his journey with Christopher Nolan, and Faster, Purple Worm!

item.title: Faster, Purple Worm! Kill! Kill! Interview Luis Carazo On His Unique Bard & Critical Role Calamity Character
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFaster, Purple Worm! Kill! Kill! combines comedy, tragedy, heroism, and heart in hour-long episodes of Dungeons & Dragons. Luis Carazo discusses his approach to playing deep and tragic characters in a short amount of time. Carazo’s interpretation of a bard in the series involves using a hand mirror as a magical implement and focusing on inspiring others to reach their fullest potential. Literature ReviewLuis Carazo discusses bringing heart into Faster, Purple Worm!

item.title: Feud Season 2 Trailer — Ryan Murphy Goes Real Housewives With 70s-Set Capote Vs. The Swans
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe official trailer for Feud season 2 has now been released by FX Networks. The second season of Feud focuses on Truman Capote and his relationship with New York socialites. The cast includes Naomi Watts, Diane Lane, Chloë Sevigny, Calista Flockhart, Demi Moore, Molly Ringwald, and Treat Williams. Literature ReviewFX Networks unveils the first official full-length trailer for Feud: Capote vs. The Swans, which is season 2 of Ryan Murphy’s anthology show.

item.title: Fire Country Season 2 Clip Reveals Time Jump Since Bode s Prison Return
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFire Country season 2 will pick up with Bode in prison for six months, and showing he doesn’t seem eager to leave. New characters will be introduced in season 2, including one who may become the lead of a potential spinoff centered on a sheriff character. The fallout from Bode’s decision to take the fall for his friend will be explored, potentially leading to long-term ramifications. Literature ReviewA clip for Fire Country season 2 confirms a time jump, revealing how long Max Theriot’s Bode has been behind bars and how he feels about it.

item.title: Fire Country Season 2 Release Date, Cast, Story, Trailer & Everything We Know
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFire Country season 2 has officially set its release date for February 16th, 2024 Viewers are anxiously waiting for the show to return after lengthy delays due to the Hollywood strikes. Despite uncertainty, Fire Country season 2 has been renewed and there is anticipation for what’s to come. Literature ReviewFire Country season 2 is well on its way, and there has been a slew of news regarding the upcoming season of the popular firefighting series.

item.title: Fire Country Season 2 Trailer Reveals Bode s Grim Reality Behind Bars
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA new teaser trailer for Fire Country highlights the grim reality for Bode, who ends up back in prison. Thieriot’s character is involved in fights behind bars and mentions not having much time. Fire Country season 2 brings new characters and potential spinoff possibilities, focusing on expanding the show’s universe. Literature ReviewA trailer for Fire Country underlines Bode’s grim reality behind bars, teasing the next chapter after the shocking season 1 finale twist.

item.title: First Young Sheldon Season 7 Premiere Image Confirms Missys New Role
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMissy’s new role in Young Sheldon’s season 7 is part of her redemption arc after years of being sidelined and ignored. Missy’s rebellious behavior in season 6 was a reflection of the show’s attempt to address past criticisms of her character’s handling. With the shorter run of season 7 and the impending death of George, Missy’s redemption won’t be easy, but she thrives when given responsibilities and steps up in times of crisis.

item.title: Flight Of The Conchords Reunion Potential Teased By Murray Actor
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFlight of the Conchords actor Rhys Darby teases a potential reunion, saying they are “always discussing” it. The show laid the groundwork for lifelong creative partnerships between the likes of Darby, Jemaine Clement, and Taika Waititi, who have all collaborated since. The higher profiles and creative skills of the cast could attract more viewers to a Flight of the Conchords reunion, making now the perfect time for it to happen.

item.title: Fool Me Once 10 Biggest Plot Holes & Headscratchers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFool Me Once neatly tied up most loose ends but still had some plot holes, making certain aspects less believable. Maya’s revelation about Joe’s murder left inconsistencies, such as the unexplained disposal of the gun and the lack of police finding it. Some characters’ actions, like Shane activating Maya’s car alarm for no reason, were unexplained and didn’t make sense. Literature ReviewDespite solving its many mysteries all simultaneously once the last piece of the puzzle was offered by Maya, Fool Me Once has various plot holes.

item.title: Fool Me Once Cast & Character Guide
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNetflix’s thriller series Fool Me Once has an impressive cast of characters, including heavy hitters like Richard Armitage and Joanna Lumley. The show is based on author Harlan Coben’s 2016 novel and follows the complex narrative of ex-soldier Maya’s investigation into her husband’s death. The show’s cast also features up-and-coming talents like Laurie Kynaston and Dino Fetscher, adding to the intrigue of the story. Literature ReviewNetflix’s eight-part thriller based on Harlan Coben’s novel of the same name boasts an impressive cast.

item.title: Fool Me Once Ending Explained What Happened To Joe & Claire
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe biggest mystery in Fool Me Once is Joe’s killer, and it turns out that Maya murdered him as revenge for him killing her sister Claire. Joe’s appearance on the nanny cam was a deepfake video created by Izabella and her boyfriend Luka, hired by Joe’s mother to make Maya have a mental breakdown. Maya’s confrontation with Judith about the deepfake video and Joe’s crimes leads to her own demise when her overconfidence and pride get the best of her.

item.title: Fool Me Once Ending s Audience Reactions Prompt Response From Author
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFool Me Once’s shocking ending generated a huge response online, with author Harlan Coben calling the reactions “a thrill.” Coben expresses satisfaction at the way the ending of the show came together. While Fool Me Once has generated a strong response online, not all of the responses have been positive, with the show not quite hitting the same highs as other Coben adaptations like The Stranger or Safe. Literature ReviewAuthor Harlan Coben responds to the reactions regarding the ending to Fool Me Once, the latest Netflix mystery show to capture audience’s attention.

item.title: Fool Me Once s Most Confusing Character Mystery Has Nothing To Do With The Murders
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe biggest mystery in Netflix’s Fool Me Once has nothing to do with the murders, but centers around a supporting character who is still alive. Shane, Maya’s best friend, starts exhibiting suspicious behavior halfway through the series, stalking her and putting a tracker on her car, but the show doesn’t explain why. Shane’s character arc lacked sufficient screen time and development, leaving viewers with unanswered questions about his actions and motives.

item.title: Fool Me Once s Most Suspicious Character Gets Passionate Defense From Book Author
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAuthor Harlan Coben defends the suspicious character Shane in Fool Me Once, explaining his actions and role in the series. Despite initial suspicion, it is revealed that Shane was not involved in the murders. Coben’s explanation adds layers to the story and suggests Shane’s actions may have been those of a concerned friend or a suspicious investigator. Literature ReviewA suspicious character in the new Netflix miniseries Fool Me Once has book author Harlan Coben giving a passionate defense of his actions.

item.title: Fool Me Once Writer Confirms 2 New Netflix Adaptations In Development
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHarlan Coben confirms that two more Netflix adaptations of his books are in development, including one in Poland and one in South America. Coben is the bestselling author behind Fool Me Once, whose TV adaptation was recently released on Netflix. Fool Me Once has been incredibly successful in its early days on Netflix, suggesting a potential comeback for Coben after Prime Video canceled Shelter. Literature ReviewFool Me Once author Harlan Coben confirms that more of his bestselling novels are getting Netflix adaptation following the show’s massive success.

item.title: For All Mankind Season 4 Ending Explained What Happens To The Goldilocks Asteroid & Happy Valley
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe season 4 finale of For All Mankind brings hope for the future of Happy Valley, but not without drama and intense moments. Margo’s decision to sabotage the Goldilocks mission has significant consequences, including her arrest and the potential downfall of Irina at Roscosmos. The Mars riot and Dani’s gunshot wound lead to a reevaluation of NASA’s leadership and a renewed focus on the organization’s original mission. Literature ReviewThe Goldilocks heist comes to a nail-biting conclusion in For All Mankind’s season 4 finale.

item.title: For All Mankind Season 4 Episode 9 Recap Why Ed Stayed On Mars & 5 Other Reveals
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSergei’s return puts Margo’s life in serious danger and could lead to an international incident. The risky deal with North Korea exposes the plan to steal Goldilocks and jeopardizes Miles’ freedom. Sergei’s death, likely ordered by Irina, leaves Margo more isolated and vulnerable than ever before. Literature ReviewEd finally reveals why he stayed on Mars, while Margo and Sergei’s future plans are cruelly dashed in For All Mankind season 4’s penultimate episode.

item.title: For All Mankind Season 4 s Shocking Ending Explained By Dani Actor
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe shocking For All Mankind season 4 finale shows that nobody is spared, adding danger and tension to the show, says actor Krys Marshall. Dani’s near-death experience brings the people of Happy Valley together, uniting them after a season of inequality and rivalry. Dani’s survival in the season 4 finale sets up potential storylines for her character in season 5. Literature ReviewFor All Mankind star Krys Marshall, who portrays Dani, explains the shocking season 4 finale and her character’s fate, sharing some shocking reveals.

item.title: For All Mankind Season 5 Story Teased By Creators After Season 4 s Wild Ending & New Time Jump
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe For All Mankind season 4 finale’s time jump sets up a future where the heist succeeds, according to creator Ben Nedivi, leading to investments in Mars and the asteroid. The show’s creators are excited about the potential to explore a larger colony on Mars and even travel beyond Mars. Positive signs suggest that a fifth season of For All Mankind is likely, with conversations already happening about ideas for it.

item.title: Forget Picards Family Death & Make Jean-Luc More “Heroic” In Star Trek First Contact, Said Patrick Stewart
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPatrick Stewart enjoyed playing an action-hero version of Captain Picard in Star Trek: First Contact after the losses his character suffered in previous film. First Contact is widely regarded as the best Star Trek: The Next Generation film, where Picard faces off against the Borg and tries to prevent Earth’s first contact with the Vulcans from being destroyed. Picard’s family tragedy is briefly mentioned in Star Trek Generations but doesn’t come up again in later films.

item.title: Forget Tales Of The Jedi, It s Time For Tales Of The Sith
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTales of the Sith could expand the Star Wars franchise by exploring compelling Sith backstories, just as Tales of the Jedi did for Count Dooku. The franchise has primarily focused on Jedi perspectives, but Tales of the Sith could reveal the Sith’s role in galactic history and delve into their exploits before the Skywalker Saga. This potential animated series could showcase major Sith figures like Palpatine, Darth Maul, and even resurrect beloved characters from the Knights of the Old Republic video games.

item.title: Former Doctor Who Lead Gives Honest Review Of David Tennant s 60th Anniversary Specials
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPeter Capaldi enjoyed Doctor Who’s 60th-anniversary episodes, praising the storyline, and performances of David Tennant and Catherine Tate, and expressing excitement for Ncuti Gatwa’s new era. The specials included nods to Capaldi’s era, mentioning his incarnation as the Twelfth Doctor and referencing his companions in a significant moment with the Toymaker. Despite not returning to the show, Capaldi still appreciates Doctor Who as a creative and longtime fan. Literature ReviewTwelfth Doctor Peter Capaldi shares his thoughts on the David Tennant Doctor Who 60th-anniversary specials and opinion on the new Doctor Ncuti Gatwa.

item.title: Former Doctor Who Showrunner Wants To Develop A British West Wing
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFormer Doctor Who showrunner Steven Moffat wants to create a British version of The West Wing, believing that British politics needs the level of insight provided by the original. Despite Moffat’s success in the realm of fantasy and detective shows, he lacks experience in purely dramatic productions like The West Wing. Moffat’s range as a writer and showrunner, demonstrated by his work on various genres, suggests that he may be capable of creating a successful British adaptation of The West Wing.

item.title: Former Doctor Who Star Shuts Down The Possibility Of Returning As The Time Lord
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFormer Doctor Who star Peter Capaldi isn’t interested in reprising his role, despite the precedent set by David Tennant’s return. Capaldi enjoyed watching the recent Doctor Who specials and praised the performances of Tennant and Catherine Tate, but he personally has no intention of coming back. Capaldi likes the idea that his Doctor is still “out there” and not confined to the TV show, allowing for interpretation and imagination of his story.

item.title: Foundation Season 3 Wishlist 10 Things We Want To See
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFoundation Season 3 should explore the history of the Robot Wars, a significant event in the show’s universe. The Mule should be the main villain in Season 3, replacing Brother Day and adding a fresh dynamic to the series. Season 3 should introduce new versions of Cleon, providing fresh characters and exploring the consequences of Demerzel’s control over them. Literature ReviewApple TV’s Foundation is one of the most exciting sci-fi series on television.

item.title: Fourth Doctor Companions Time War Fate Revealed In New Doctor Who Short
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe new video revisits Leela’s final moments in the Last Great Time War. Leela, an ex-companion of the Fourth Doctor, is given a teleportation device by a Gallifreyan soldier to escape the conflict. Leela’s fate on Gallifrey after her departure from the Doctor is revealed, showcasing her continued battles against evil. Literature ReviewA new trailer for Doctor Who’s “The Collection: Season 15” home release visits the Time War to reveal the fate of Louise Jameson’s companion Leela.

item.title: Frasier Reboot Producers Comment On Whether Eve & Freddy Will Ever Be A Couple
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe executive producers of the Fraiser reboot are considering the possibility of Eve and Freddy getting together, but want to make sure it feels right for the characters and don’t want to emulate the love story between Daphne and Niles. They want to slowly unpack the potential romance between Eve and Freddy and mimic real life, rather than rushing into it. Due to the recent death of Eve’s partner, there is nothing imminent that could possibly happen between Eve and Freddy, and it may take a couple of seasons before their relationship develops further.

item.title: Frasier s Niles Replacement Is Already Breaking 1 Rule That Made The Original So Good
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Frasier reboot introduces Alan as a replacement for Niles, but their personalities and dynamics with Frasier are very different. Alan serves a different purpose than Niles, as he helps ground Frasier and call him out on his pretentious tendencies. While Alan may be a replacement for Niles, he is fundamentally his own character and brings something unique to the show. Literature ReviewThe Frasier reboot doesn’t feature Niles Crane, but it features a replacement, who is breaking one golden rule from the original series.

item.title: Frasier Season 2 Story Tease From Kelsey Grammer Raises Question Of Major Show Change
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFrasier season 2 may bring big changes for the character, potentially including a move out of Boston or a shift in his story arc. Frasier’s relationship with his grown-up son was a central focus in season 1, and their storyline has been resolved, allowing Frasier the freedom to leave Boston. Relocating and leaving Boston will also address issues with Frasier’s Harvard storyline and his absence from Cheers. Literature ReviewDespite the Frasier reboot season 2 not being officially renewed yet, Kelsey Grammer seems to tease some big changes ahead for the psychiatrist.

item.title: Friends Massive Joey Change Stopped The Show Getting Canceled After Season 1
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYJoey’s character in Friends was originally meant to be flirtatious and shallow, but not unintelligent. The decision to make Joey dumber on Friends was intentional, as the creators wanted to differentiate him from Chandler. Changing Joey’s character to be less intelligent helped balance out the comedic dynamic of the group and contributed to the show’s long-term success. Literature ReviewOne facet of Joey Tribbiani’s character was changed early on in Friends’ run, which ended up saving the show and preventing it from failing.

item.title: Friends Cast Reimagined In Pixar Art Style (& Chandler Looks Like He Belongs On Mad Men)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFriends reimagined in Pixar-style art captures the essence of the original characters and their relationships. Friends as a Pixar movie could maintain the quirks and humor of the sitcom while adding a comedic effect and charm through exaggerated traits. A Pixar movie version of Friends would maintain the core theme of the unbreakable bond between the characters. Literature ReviewThe Friends cast gets reimagined in Pixar’s signature animation style, and the late Matthew Perry’s Chandler Bing looks like he belongs on Mad Men.

item.title: Friends The Characters Ages (& How They Get It Wrong)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe ages of the characters in Friends were inconsistent throughout the series, making it difficult to determine their exact ages. Some characters had inconsistent birthdays, with Rachel, Phoebe, and Ross having multiple references to different birth months. The inconsistencies in the ages of the characters didn’t have a significant impact on the show, as the focus was more on the relationships between the characters rather than small details like their ages.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Episode #18 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End returns with a new installment, setting up a new arc in episode #18. The new opening and buildup suggest a departure from the usual episodic format, allowing for deeper exploration of new characters. Episode #17 had significant character development and a month-long blizzard, while episode #18 will focus on the Mage Exam in the new city. Literature ReviewFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End episode #18 will begin a new arc for the series, with Frieren taking a Mage certification exam to continue traveling.

item.title: From Season 2 Finale Recap & Ending Explained What Happened To Tabitha
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY The season 2 finale of From concludes with a cliffhanger that has significant implications for the show's future, as Tabitha awakens outside the town after being pushed out of the lighthouse. Tabitha's awakening from a coma suggests that the town's inhabitants may actually be in comas outside the town, but need to "die" in order to wake up on the other side. The symbol seen in the tunnels and Jade's visions is connected to the children and the lighthouse, and its real meaning is still unknown.

item.title: Fuller House Should Have Recast Michelle Tanner (& Not Doing So Made Her Absence More Noticeable)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Full House reboot Fuller House made a mistake by not recasting the character of Michelle Tanner. Elizabeth Olsen, the younger sister of the Olsen twins, would have been an ideal replacement for Michelle. Michelle’s absence in Fuller House is a noticeable plot hole and the show would have been better off recasting her rather than ignoring her character altogether. Literature ReviewAs the only original character who didn’t return for the reboot, Michelle Tanner’s absence in Fuller House proves she should’ve just been recast.

item.title: Fullmetal Alchemist Olivier Cosplay is the Definition of Badass
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYValendraVenus recreates Oliver Mira Armstrong’s iconic pose in a breathtaking cosplay that will excite fans of Fullmetal Alchemist. Olivier, known for her ruthless persona and strong personality, is one of the most intriguing characters in the anime. Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood, the more faithful adaptation, remains one of the highest-rated anime series and continues to live on in fans’ hearts through cosplay. Literature ReviewA fan perfectly captures the Major General’s regal and commanding presence with their cosplay of the beloved character.

item.title: Game Of Thrones Ending Explained King Bran, Daenerys Death & All Twists
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDaenerys’ downfall and death mirrored that of her father, Aerys II, with both being betrayed by a Lannister and ultimately leading to the end of the Targaryen line. Bran Stark becomes the new ruler of Westeros, chosen by the lords and ladies of the Seven Kingdoms due to his powerful story and ability to remember and tell Westeros’ history. Jon Snow, revealed to be a Targaryen and with a stronger claim to the Iron Throne, is exiled to the Night’s Watch, returning to the North where he finally finds peace.

item.title: Game Of Thrones Two Daario Actors Bonded On The Set Of Rebel Moon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEd Skrein and Michiel Huisman bonded over their shared role of Daario Naharis from Game of Thrones while working together on Rebel Moon. Skrein and Huisman had a positive relationship on set and there were no hard feelings about the casting change. Skrein understands the nature of the industry and believes in maintaining a positive and respectful attitude towards fellow actors, even when roles are replaced. Literature ReviewEd Skrein and Michiel Huisman bonded over their shared Game of Thrones role of Daario on the set of Zack Snyder’s Rebel Moon during production.

item.title: Game Of Thrones Actor On How The Show Created A Problem For His Career
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGame of Thrones star Iwan Rheon reveals how the show has typecast him as psychopathic characters, creating a problem for his career. Despite this, Rheon has taken on a variety of roles since the show’s end, including playing Adolf Hitler and Mick Mars. He is eager to break away from playing villains and will be portraying a different character in upcoming projects, such as a middle-aged Welsh man and a wheeler-dealer in Ancient Rome.

item.title: Game Of Thrones All 8 Characters Who Survived From Beginning To End
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMany key characters from season 1 of Game of Thrones survived until the end, despite the show’s reputation for killing off beloved characters. Jon Snow, Sansa Stark, Arya Stark, and Bran Stark are among the characters who made it through the entire series. The fates of other surviving characters, such asnBronn and the direwolf Ghost, were also revealed in the finale. Literature ReviewAfter 73 blood-filled episodes, only 8 characters lived from Game of Thrones’ pilot until the end of season 8 - here’s who survived Game of Thrones.

item.title: Game of Thrones How Much Time Passes From Seasons 1-8
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Game of Thrones timeline is difficult to determine due to contradictions and inconsistencies, but it is estimated that the events of the show occurred over a span of about six to seven years. The Westerosi calendar system, with years marked by AC (Aegon’s Conquest) and BC (before the conquest), helps in understanding the passage of time in the Game of Thrones universe. Days are 24 hours long and years are approximately 365 days long.

item.title: Game Of Thrones Season 8 Criticism Gets Candid Response From Co-Creator
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGame of Thrones season 8 was met with considerable criticism, with blame largely pinned on creators David Benioff and D.B. Weiss. Benioff reveals that he hoped audiences would enjoy the final episodes of the show, but acknowledges that not everyone did. Weiss says that fan interactions since the show’s ending have been positive. A key problem with Game of Thrones season 8 isn’t necessarily the actual story decisions, but the reduced episode count of seasons 7 and 8, which meant that many plot points felt unearned.

item.title: Game Of Thrones Spinoff Update Changes Everything About The Show (For The Better)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe planned House of the Dragon spinoff Nine Voyages has switched from live-action to animation due to budgetary constraints. George R. R. Martin says that he supports the decision to animate Nine Voyages and believes it will allow for a better depiction of the vast world and numerous locations in the franchise. Alongside Nine Voyages, there are two other animated projects in development in the Game of Thrones universe.

item.title: Gargoyles Live-Action Reboot Return Chances Get Optimistic Response From Original Disney Star
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYKeith David has not been contacted by Disney about returning for the live-action Gargoyles reboot, but he is eager to reprise his role. David’s role as Goliath in the original animated show was a significant breakthrough for him in voice acting. There are various possibilities for David’s involvement in the reboot, including reprising his role as Goliath or taking on a different character, such as the Gargoyle Elder Hudson, or key antagonist David Xanatos.

item.title: Gates McFadden Reveals Dr. Beverly Crushers Best Star Trek TNG Season
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGates McFadden believes her best season as Dr. Beverly Crusher on Star Trek: The Next Generation was the last season. McFadden enjoyed directing the episode “Genesis” and thought the series finale, “All Good Things,” was great. She liked the storyline of Crusher and Picard being married and divorced, and Star Trek: Picard season 3 delivered some of those stories in a new way. Literature ReviewStar Trek: The Next Generation’s Dr.

item.title: Gen V s Supe Virus Brings The Boys r To The Comics Dark Ending
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGen V’s supe virus introduces a major plot point that could bring The Boys’ storyline closer to the original comic book’s ending. The existence of the supe virus in The Boys’ universe suggests that it will play a pivotal role in the events of The Boys season 4. The introduction of the supe virus could have a significant impact on Billy Butcher’s character, potentially leading to his moral corruption and a possible supe genocide.

item.title: Gen V Subtly Made A-Train s Story Even More Tragic Before The Boys Season 4
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA-Train’s backstory adds a tragic layer to his character, highlighting the selfishness of powerful supes. A-Train’s influence on the Black community is exploited by Vought, causing harm to the very people he claims to represent. The Boys is setting up a potential redemption arc for A-Train in season 4 despite his past actions. Literature ReviewThe Boys highlights how tragic A-Train’s story is for those that look up to him, and one Gen V scene makes the supe’s character arc even sadder.

item.title: Gen V Teased A Terrible Compound V Side Effect The Boys Hasn t Discussed
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGen V’s season 1 finale reveals that Compound V can have unexpected negative effects, potentially dooming supes in the long run. Polarity’s medical condition hints at wider issues: Polarity, a retired supe in Gen V, suffers from seizures and brain damage from his magnetic powers. This suggests that other supes may also face similar medical problems as they age. The introduction of V24, a temporary superpower drug in The Boys’ season 3, raises the possibility that the harmful effects of Compound V, like seizures, could be more common than previously thought.

item.title: George Carlin s Thomas The Tank Engine Narrations Receive A Hilarious YouTube Edit
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGeorge Carlin’s stand-up comedy and Thomas the Tank Engine collide in a hilariously unexpected way on YouTube, showcasing his versatility as a performer. The clever fusion of Carlin’s adult-oriented routines with the innocent children’s show offers a fresh and humorous reinterpretation of Thomas and his friends. Carlin’s role as a narrator for Thomas & Friends highlighted his remarkable range as an entertainer and his ability to connect with audiences of all ages.

item.title: Georgies Young Sheldon Season 7 Story Reveals A Big Bang Theory Problem
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYYoung Sheldon’s focus on the Cooper family’s backstory sets them up for sad futures. The spinoff humanizes the Coopers, making it difficult to invest in their fates already known from The Big Bang Theory. Young Sheldon should try to improve the Cooper family’s futures and provide a more hopeful ending for these beloved characters. Literature ReviewYoung Sheldon season 7’s Georgie storyline is guaranteed to end badly, which highlights an issue with The Big Bang Theory’s version of the Coopers.

item.title: Ghosts Season 3 s New Story Update Follows Up On Major Mystery & Season 2 Cliffhanger
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGhosts season 3 will follow up on the season 2 cliffhanger of which character crossed over to the other side. The premiere will also involve Sam and Jay’s plan to turn their barn into a restaurant. The Ghosts cast have received pay increases for season 3, suggesting that none of the main spirits have crossed over yet. Literature ReviewNew details about Ghosts season 3 follow up on the CBS sitcom’s cliffhanger, offering hints about what’s next for Sam, Jay, and the overall ensemble.

item.title: Gilmore Girls Biggest Rory Complaint Is The Most Realistic Part Of The Show
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRory’s behavior in the later seasons of Gilmore Girls receives criticism for making poor decisions and sabotaging her career. Rory’s stubbornness and difficulty accepting change are magnified as she gets older, leading to irrational and erratic behavior. Rory’s evolution and changes in behavior after high school are the most realistic aspect of the show, as she learns to navigate the real world and faces the consequences of her actions.

item.title: Gilmore Girls Creator Already Confirmed Another Revival Would Fix The Show s Biggest Mistake, 17 Years Later
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYLane Kim’s ending in Gilmore Girls was the show’s biggest mistake, depriving her of her dreams and independence. The 2016 revival, A Year in the Life, failed to address or correct Lane’s disappointing fate. Creator Amy Sherman-Palladino acknowledges the mistake and would like to fix Lane’s story if there is another revival. Literature ReviewGilmore Girls creator Amy Sherman-Palladino reveals she would want to address the series’ biggest character failure in a potential second revival.

item.title: Glee Co-Creator Gives Careful Response When Considering A Potential Remake
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCo-creator Brad Falchuk doubts a reboot of Glee would work, questioning the purpose aside from being a moneymaker. The cast and crew have expressed their thoughts on a potential reboot, with many acknowledging the need for changes due to the show’s problematic aspects. Ryan Murphy has discussed the idea of a Broadway take on Glee, but there haven’t been concrete efforts to bring back the series. Literature ReviewGlee co-creator Brad Falchuk strikes a measured tone when addressing the potential of a remake and assesses the purpose of bringing back the dramedy.

item.title: Godzilla Crosses Over Into TMNT 80s Cartoon In Art That Sees The Kaiju In New York City
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGodzilla crosses over into the world of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles in fan art depicting him stomping around New York City. The artist was inspired by a particular version of Godzilla from a movie and includes references to the TMNT cartoon in the artwork. If Godzilla were to appear in the ’80s cartoon universe, the Turtles would face a significant challenge and may require help from others to defeat him.

item.title: Godzilla s Power Turning Pink Makes More Sense Now, Thanks To Monarch s Show
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGodzilla’s power changing colors from blue to pink in Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire is explained in Monarch: Legacy of Monsters episode 9. The Hollow Earth energy source sought by APEX in Godzilla vs. Kong is confirmed to be blue, but there are other colors and forms of energy, including pink, in the Hollow Earth. Godzilla’s transformation in Godzilla x Kong may happen as a response to a loss in a fight, and he could absorb the energy required for the transformation in the Hollow Earth.

item.title: Gojo s Limitless Technique in Jujutsu Kaisen Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGojo’s access to the Limitless technique, alongside his Six Eyes ability, makes him the strongest sorcerer in Jujutsu Kaisen. The Limitless technique allows Gojo to distort and manipulate space, providing him with a powerful advantage in fights against cursed spirits. Gojo’s use of Blue and Red cursed techniques gives him ranged attacks and the ability to generate intense gravitational force and repulsion, respectively. His Hollow Purple attack is his strongest regular technique.

item.title: Golden Globes 2024 Winners Revealed
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe 2024 Golden Globes honor the best in film and television from 2023, with Barbie, Oppenheimer, and Succession leading the nominations. The awards show introduced new categories including “Cinematic and Box Office Achievement” and “Best Performance in Stand-Up Comedy on Television.” Stand-up comedian Jo Koy hosts the 2024 Golden Globes, which aired on CBS from The Beverly Hilton hotel in Los Angeles. Literature ReviewAwards season kicks off with the 81st Golden Globes on CBS honoring the best in film and television from 2023 – see the full list of winners here.

item.title: Good Omens Neil Gaiman Has Perfect Response To Dramatic Question About Aziraphale & Crowley In Season 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGood Omens creator Neil Gaiman jokes that in season 3, the characters Crowley and Aziraphale are “barely in it” and both get killed off. Gaiman instead teases that season 3 will focus on a trio of rabbits who open a conveyor belt sushi restaurant in the big city. Despite Gaiman’s humorous suggestions, Crowley and Aziraphale are still likely to be central to the unfolding drama in season 3. Literature ReviewGood Omens creator Neil Gaiman answers with the perfect response to dramatic questions about Aziraphale and Crowley’s fate in season 3.

item.title: Gorgeous Dark Fantasy Anime By Attack on Titan Studio is Criminally Underrated
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWIT Studio’s adaptation of The Girl from the Other Side unfortunately lacks recognition compared to the studio’s bigger hits, like Attack on Titan. The unique sketchbook-like animation style adds to the dreamlike atmosphere of the medieval countryside setting. The OVA showcases the touching yet tragic tale of Teacher’s endeavor to protect the innocent Shiva, leaving viewers with a beautifully poignant ending. Literature ReviewFrom WIT Studios, The Girl from the Other Side, a 70-minute OVA with just three episodes deserves a full-length first season.

item.title: Grand Admiral Thrawn Is The Worst Enemy The Mandalorians Could Ever Face
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGrand Admiral Thrawn is the most formidable Imperial officer and a huge threat to the Mandalorians. Thrawn’s powers of perception and ability to study enemies’ art make him dangerous. Mandalorians’ beskar armor, tied to their culture and tactics, makes them uniquely vulnerable to Thrawn’s tactics. Literature ReviewGrand Admiral Thrawn may be the most dangerous enemy the Mandalorians could ever face, and it could have implications for their Star Wars future.

item.title: Grey s Anatomy s TV Reunion With Original Cast Will Include One Unexpected Star
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGrey’s Anatomy season 1 cast members will have a reunion at the 75th Emmy Awards. Ellen Pompeo, Justin Chambers, James Pickens Jr., and Chandra Wilson will be presenters. Katherine Heigl will also be part of the reunion despite leaving the show under a haze of controversy midway through season 6. Literature ReviewA Grey’s Anatomy season 1 cast reunion is coming to television soon, and it features one surprising original cast member from the medical drama.

item.title: Grey s Anatomy Season 20 Bringing Back One Half Of A Divisive Couple
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAlex Landi is returning to Grey’s Anatomy for season 20 after his character’s absence since May 2022. Landi shared a teaser image on Instagram dressed in scrubs, indicating his comeback to the show. The duration of Landi’s return and how many episodes he will be in are currently unknown. Literature ReviewA Grey’s Anatomy cast member who was previously part of a divisive major couple reveals their imminent return on the upcoming season 20.

item.title: Grey s Anatomy Season 20 Needs To Get 1 Detail Of Meredith s Return Right
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYIt’s crucial for Grey’s Anatomy season 20 to get one detail of Meredith Grey’s return right, considering her importance to the show’s success. Season 20 shouldn’t have Meredith taking center stage, as her story has already been well-explored and other characters deserve the focus. The show can strike the right balance by bringing Meredith back for a limited role, allowing her to reconnect with the other doctors and consult on major cases.

item.title: Grey s Anatomy Season 20 Wishlist 9 Things We Want To See
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGrey’s Anatomy season 20 will address the unresolved storylines from season 19 and bring the focus back to romance. The fate of the interns and the consequences of their actions in the season 19 finale must be revealed. The show needs to address Teddy’s sudden illness, explain what led to her cardiac arrest, and explore the aftermath of her medical emergency. Literature ReviewFrom Grey’s Anatomy season 19 stories ending in a cliffhanger to relationships needing to be set up, season 20 has plenty of storylines to tackle.

item.title: Gyeongseong Creature Part 2s Ending & THAT Post-Credits Scene Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYChae-ok’s death is revealed to be a misdirection, with the final scene showing her brought back to life by her mother’s powers. The detective may now become a monster herself. The post-credits scene in Gyeongseong Creature episode 10 takes the show over 60 years into the future, setting up a second season in modern-day Seoul and introducing a character played by Park Seo-joon who may or not be Tae-sang. Tae-sang’s unchanged appearance in the modern-day raises questions about his possible transformation or special powers, possibly acquired through the contaminated water from episode 7.

item.title: Gyeongseong Creature Season 2 Is Now Inevitable After THAT Tae-sang Cliffhanger
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe cliffhanger ending of Gyeongseong Creature season 1 indicates that a second season is needed. The post-credits scene reveals a character resembling Tae-sang in the present day, leaving their identity open for interpretation. Season 2 would have to be different from season 1, taking place in modern-day Seoul and potentially exploring immortality. Literature ReviewGyeongseong Creature season 2 is looking a lot more likely after the end of season 1, which included a post-credits scene that changed everything.

item.title: Gyeongseong Creature Season 2 s Announcement Confirms It Will Be A Completely Different Show
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGyeongseong Creature season 2 will take place in 2024 Seoul, introducing a new modern-day setting for the show’s story. Park Seo-jun and Han So-hee will return, leading to theories about descendants or reincarnations of their original characters, Tae-sang and Chae-ok, in Gyeongseong Creature season 2. The shift to a modern setting and the potential return of the original characters offer a fresh take on the show, reinventing it while retaining the essence of the first season’s love story.

item.title: Hacks Season 3 Confirmation, Cast, & Everything We Know
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY“Hacks” season 3 will be released in spring 2024, after delays due to health issues and industry strikes. The main cast members, including Jean Smart and Hannah Einbinder, will be returning for season 3. The plot of season 3 will likely explore Ava’s new life after being fired and Deborah’s experiences with newfound fame. Literature ReviewAfter many delays, the HBO series Hacks is returning for its third season, and there are already a ton of exciting updates about the award winner.

item.title: Hacks Season 3 Release Window Revealed
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHacks season 3 finally has a release window: Spring 2024. The comedy has received numerous awards nominations and wins across its two seasons. The season 2 finale set up intriguing possibilities for another season, leading to the show’s renewal for season 3. Literature ReviewHacks season 3 finally has a release window after the acclaimed comedy’s most recent episode, the season 2 finale, dropped back in Summer 2022. After a long wait, Hacks season 3 finally has a release window.

item.title: Halo Season 2 Trailer Finally Clarifies Game Timeline Connection With Major Reach Event
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA new Halo season 2 trailer teases the fall of Reach at the hands of the Covenant. The TV show and games take place in separate universes, but the destruction of Reach in the games is the precursor to Halo: Combat Evolved and the discovery of the titular ring. The trailer teases that there will be plenty of action to come in season 2, including an homage to the first game’s many ship corridor fights.

item.title: Han So-hees 8 Best K-Dramas, Ranked
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHan So-hee’s breakout role was in the k-drama “The World of the Married”, where she showcased her ability to tackle darker, thrilling material. In the popular romantic k-drama “Nevertheless”, Han So-hee delivered a standout performance as Yoo Na-bi, a young woman who no longer believes in love. In the thriller crime series “My Name”, Han So-hee impressed audiences with her portrayal of Yoon Ji-woo, a young woman seeking vengeance after her father’s death.

item.title: Harley Quinn Show s Future Gets Exciting Update From Kaley Cuoco Amid DCU Reset
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYKaley Cuoco expresses surprise but excitement about the future of Harley Quinn and confirms she will continue playing the role. The show’s renewal for a fifth season in 2023 is not only a testament to its success, but could potentially lead to a larger DC franchise on HBO Max. With a spinoff centered on Kite Man in the works and James Gunn’s interest in producing DC spinoffs, Harley Quinn could fill the void for fans wanting more of the iconic character.

item.title: Harry Kims 10 Failed Romances On Star Trek Voyager, Ranked Worst To Best
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEnsign Harry Kim had numerous failed romances throughout his time on Star Trek: Voyager, leaving him always alone in the end. Some of Harry’s failed romances were more interesting than others, such as his relationship with the holographic Marayna. Despite his romantic failures, Harry was a valuable member of Voyager’s crew and had his fair share of compelling storylines. Literature ReviewHarry Kim famously had a long line of failed romances during his time on Star Trek: Voyager, but some of his relationships were better than others.

item.title: Hazbin Hotel Win Free Tickets To L.A. Screening With Q&A Of Prime Video & A24 s Wild Animated Show
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYScreen Rant is offering L.A. readers a chance to attend a special early screening of Hazbin Hotel before its premiere. Enter the giveaway by emailing your name and email for up to three guests. Hazbin Hotel is a unique venture for Prime Video, as it marks a rare foray into adult animation. The show could potentially be the start of a lasting relationship with creator Vivienne Medrano, with season 2 already ordered.

item.title: HBO s House Of The Dragon Spinoff Will Continue An Exciting Fantasy Franchise Trend
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNine Voyages will now be an animated spinoff of House of the Dragon rather than a live-action series. The decision to make the spinoff animated continues a trend seen with other fantasy franchises like The Lord of the Rings and The Witcher.
